subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: With the English season kicking off Sunday in the Community Shield, the Chelsea manager Carlo Ancelotti is still getting acquainted with his squad and his Manchester United counterpart, Alex Ferguson, is trying to decide who to field in the absence of key players.
